::KitKat::

She had finished the clone of Megatron.  It was perfect down to the 
last detail. Even the perfect skin color.  It stood before her in 
beast mode.  She hooked up a few wired to his head and started in on 
the program that would let her control the clone.  She smiled broadly.
"Yeah, a few more minutes, and he's ready."  She had on a small head 
set that would allow her to give the commands to the clone. She also 
programmed it to take only her voice commands.  She added a few extra 
programs that would allow her to control the clone with out the 
headset if they were in close proximity.  But for the most part, it 
would have to be controlled through the head set.  She worked 
feverously to get this finished. She was grinning with self pride at 
her accomplishmetn.  She culdn't wait to face her clone off with the 
real Megatron.  She would give her right arm again to see Megatron's 
face when he saw his own clone.
